entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 69,804Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 572

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham.Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave.The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running.Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother—the one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human.Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.

entry.title: Tired Stars
entry.summary:
Author: ResidentJazz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,182Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 234

Summary: In the shadows of Wayne Manor, silence cuts sharper than any blade.Dick Grayson is unraveling.Bruce won’t talk about it.Jason can’t walk away from it.And with Alfred overseas, the rest of the family is left splintered — trying to hold together the person who once held them all.

entry.title: Null Signature
entry.summary:
Author: AiKotoba

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 93,149Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 69

Summary: Dick Grayson has seen monsters before. He just never expected to recognize one. The pit is Gotham’s best-kept secret—an underground arena where bio-engineered beasts fight to the death, and the crowds cheer louder for blood than justice. But it’s not the monsters that pull him in. It’s the man behind one of them. Red Hood doesn’t speak much. Doesn’t take off the helmet. Doesn’t miss. He baits the deadliest creature in the ring like it’s an extension of himself—and maybe it is. Dick was only supposed to observe. Now he can’t look away. Because Wrathnir fights like someone who’s trained. Red Hood watches like someone who’s remembering. And Dick’s starting to think the thing in the cage isn’t the only ghost down here.

entry.title: You are precious to me.
entry.summary:
Author: Nyx_dreamy

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,345Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 32

Summary: Damian had been sexually assaulted and after that his father saw the video, he just want to run away. That is how he end up living with Dick. Dick is conflicated about his feelings for Jason. Damian is now under his care and him and Bruce are still awkward around each other. And something is up with Tim but he doesn't know what. Jason is waiting for Dick to give him a proper answer. His hate for Bruce is too strong and he do not feel welcome in their perfect little family. or Everyone is dealing with things and their family is slowly falling appart. Would they succeed to all get along and get over the mistakes of the past?

entry.title: My little Robin
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,753Chapters: 8/46Kudos: 83

Summary: After Robin got kidnapped, ages ago, for the ploy of a love sick Talia, for proposing to Bruce in their twisted way, she'd come to Dick, desperate, alone, pretending to be broken.Dick, just fired as Robin, with a replacement lined up, doesn't believe one word she says, until she starts being honest. Until he sees a way to handle his hurt feelings.Three years later, she's back. Not broken, not quite as desperate, and yet honest, again. Honest how she's afraid of her position as heir to the League, with an actual male heir around. Honest about her wish to get rid of said heir.Dick has no choice, not really. He has to take Damian in. It's his son, after all.Fic is fully written and will be uploaded chapter by chapter. Upload every Wednesday and Sunday. Which means this will be done... Around Christmas?

entry.title: Bad men die
entry.summary:
Author: authorettejasmin

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 53,142Chapters: 21/?Kudos: 575

Summary: I do not sleep; a symbol burns out in the sky and my body tingles, sweats cold and aches bone-deep. The arms around me squeeze tighter and I feel him shake behind me.The one who calls me brother.The one who calls me Jason.He loves me, protects me and even though I don't remember who I am or how I got here, I know one thing.A bad man is trying to hurt him.And bad men should die. Jason digs his way out and Talia may find him first, but she isn't the one who keeps him.

entry.title: The Dynamic Duo
entry.summary:
Author: sarriathmg

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,354Chapters: 2/30Kudos: 72

Summary: Having been Batman for four years, Dick Grayson still hasn't gotten used to the heaviness of the cowl, the loneliness of watching the neon-lit city unfold around him, weighing on his shoulders.Now, investigating a mass disappearance case that happened a few days ago in a late-night diner, Dick meets a young street rat who's had friends tangled up in the same web.Jason Todd has all the traits Dick saw in himself when he first started—curious, shrewd, agile, and, most importantly, wanting to do good. Despite Dick's initial rejection of the boy, he starts to think that a long-term partnership isn't a bad idea. Perhaps four years have been long enough time for the current stasis.Perhaps, he thinks, it's time for his own Robin.

entry.title: Black&Red
entry.summary:
Author: JillSandwich (Just_VIolence)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,674Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 23

Summary: Jason and Bruce have finally started talking again, but their relationship is still strained. Bruce isn’t sure if Jason’s ready to be back on the team — not when the issue of killing still hangs over his head. To test him, Bruce sends Jason on a undercover mission with Cassandra Cain: infiltrate and gather intel on Black Mask’s gang, who’ve been making dangerous moves in Gotham with some serious muscle behind them. Jason assumes he’s being punished. What he doesn’t realize is that Cass is there not just for backup — but to keep him in check. He barely knows her. He doesn’t know what she’s capable of but he’s about to find out.

entry.title: Instructions for Surviving a Gotham Heatwave
entry.summary:
Author: ziptiesand

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,810Chapters: 5/22Kudos: 8

Summary: Clark is not getting the romantic summer vacation Bruce promised, and instead, has been assigned the company of one Zatanna Zatara while Bruce continues to work on another ever-important, ever-urgent case in Gotham. The thing is, this would all be fine and normal, if Zatanna's heart wasn't constantly skipping a beat whenever Clark was around, or if she and Bruce weren't teetering on the edge of spilling their guts out to each other at any given moment.Meanwhile, Red Hood is on the verge of another Lazarus Pit-induced mental breakdown, Nightwing is only just starting to remember that his name is not, in fact, Ric Grayson, and they keep crossing paths while on a case. Cue cat-and-mouse chases across rooftops, trips to Zatanna's parlour of magical cognitive therapy, and an undercover drugs bust at The Iceberg Lounge, where ex crime-lord Red Hood might get more than he bargained for with his interim partner in crime.It's going to be an interesting summer.

entry.title: Situationship From Hell
entry.summary:
Author: birdwatching

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,947Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 123

Summary: She rolled her eyes, refusing to feel stupid for this. “You could at least be civil, asshole. We are technically siblings.” Dick’s taunting face suddenly turned cold and stony. “I’m not Bruce’s son. You’re not my sister. You’re just another orphan living in this house.” Her first meeting with Dick was something awkward and carefully orchestrated, but that’s usually the one that comes to mind most when she thinks about the beginning of their relationship. Jay thought it was a dream come true when she was picked up off the street by the richest guy in Gotham, especially when he proved himself to be a decent man. The only problem is the asshole who lives down the hall from her.Bruce and Dick had a good thing going for almost seven years before he decided to take in a random kid, and Dick makes his problem with it abundantly clear.She hits puberty eventually.(Updating regularly, stay tuned 😋)

entry.title: Freefall
entry.summary:
Author: onArete

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 149,253Chapters: 25/30Kudos: 369

Summary: Being Robin feels like flying: steady, wind-whistle certainty that what he and Batman are doing is right. Even with his hands bloody, Dick doesn’t waver. He knows they’re doing good: permanently removing the murderers and criminals from Gotham.Of course, nobody can fly forever.
